definition: abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: The decomposed snowflake structure visualizes the hierarchical structure of dimensions very well.
sentences.chinese: 分解的雪花型結構很好地展示了維度的層次結構。

sentences.english: The lowest Hofstede Dimension for the Netherlands is Masculinity (MAS) at 14.
sentences.chinese: 最低得分的一個維度是男性氣質取向，14。

sentences.english: One of her assignments is to form a lump of clay into a block and then measure the dimensions of the block.
sentences.chinese: 她的一項任務是形成黏土團入塊然後測量塊的維度。

sentences.english: So, anchor, ascend, drift back. Do not come back to Three.
sentences.chinese: 所以，錨定，揚升，不要再回到第三維度了。

sentences.english: In this case, the dimension is the country.
sentences.chinese: 在這個例子當中，那個維度就是國家。

sentences.english: In these cases, your dimensional queries may start to slow down.
sentences.chinese: 這時，您的多維度查詢可能會變慢。

sentences.english: Sex description in literature is the one dimension to reveal human nature.
sentences.chinese: 文學中的性描寫，是表現人性的一個維度。

sentences.english: The keys you choose for the dimensions must be the foreign keys of the fact.
sentences.chinese: 您爲維度所選擇的鍵必須是事實的外鍵。

sentences.english: Differences mainly exist in the dimension of the independent self-construal.
sentences.chinese: 差異主要體現在獨立自我構念維度上。

sentences.english: It starts from two dimensions— countryside and city.
sentences.chinese: 本章從農村和城市兩個維度展開。

sentences.english: Therefore another approach can be used for the time dimension.
sentences.chinese: 因此，時間維度可以使用另一種方法。

sentences.english: Another hallmark of string theory is the positing of additional dimensions.
sentences.chinese: 弦論另一個標誌是額外的維度。

sentences.english: That’s why it’s called the blessing of dimensionality.
sentences.chinese: 這就是我說的‘來自高維度的恩賜。

sentences.english: There is one immolation and it focuses its attention in various dimensions.
sentences.chinese: 有一個自臥冬它將其留意力聚焦於不同的維度。

sentences.english: Each dimension has its own set of metrics, together with its scoring components.
sentences.chinese: 每個維度有其自己的量度集，以及其計分組件。

definition: aspect/facet/level (political, psychological, spiritual etc)/(geology) bedding plane
to create/to bring about/to produce/to set (a record)
space/room/(fig.) scope/leeway/(astronomy) outer space/(physics, math.) space
